name: Duality (itch) (NewPuldrix)
description:
Duality is a platformer with the player having the power to change his state to a particle or a wave (somewhat).

How to Play:

Arrrow keys or WASD : Move

Space :Jump

Left or Right Mouse : Change State (you will only be able to change state in the middle of the 2nd level)

Goal : advance to the next level by unlocking and entering door.

You have 3 bars, Health, Sanity, Danger (you will understand all 3).

Work In Progress: 

Music and Sound Effects are coming for the next update.

Enjoy :3
